page.title: 07BIOGRAPHY OF DACRE RESIDENT.
page.content: Mr.Robert William Bell was born in 1899 and will be 86 on 20th.July 1985.We talked with him on the village green seat outside his home.He told us that Dacre has changed very little in the 55 yrs.he has lived there.The main changes were the closing of the village school and a small number of brick built houses added to the village in recent years.Dacre is very much as it was in the past,unaffected by change;quiet and peaceful in the valley of the River Dacre from which its name derives.He left school in 1913 age 14yrs.and started work the next day.He was paid two gold sovereigns for four months work.He was able to buy a suit of clothes,a pair of clogs and a melodion ( musical instrument)and had one shilling change.
